website_summaries.verdict: Store a cool dozen bottles in this attractively-priced refrigerator that's designed to create the perfect wine-drinking experience.
pros: This cooler offers a slim design
Users like the lighted interior, which allows a view of their inventory without opening the door
Easy to program to the desired temperature
Both reds and whites chill consistently together, even though this isn’t a dual temp fridge
cons: May need to remove shelving for larger bottles
This model doesn't have a door lock

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: We love our 12-bottle wine fridge! It arrived in two days in perfect condition. It was packed very well. After letting it stand unplugged for 2 hours as instructed in the directions for use, we plugged it in and immediately noticed how quiet it was. We have it in our great room not too far from our recliners, and we cannot hear it at all. It cooled down to the desired 50 F in about 20 minutes. We have it loaded up with our favorite white wines, and the temperature of the one bottle we've opened so far was perfect. Could not be more pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect wine cooler.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, quiet, looks sharp, and good quality for the price. Only downside is that interior dimensions are very restrictive. For bottles like sparkling wines, you’ll need to remove a shelf (they slide out easily) or reverse the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scratch that, I’d still buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Love the look, love the way it works in my dining room and I’ve already had a lot of great comments about it from my friends. No real assembly required and after you adjust the temperature it really doesn’t make a sound. One concern however was it came with scratches at the top where the door hinge is. It’s really not noticeable to anyone else unfortunately when I pulled it out of the box I noticed and I can’t help but stare when I’m closer up.
customer_reviews.author: Lance D Perry

customer_reviews.title: Good. Careful with the delivery guy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a dent in the back. Not very noticable. It works ok. One issue. Lenght of the bottles is ok when not opening bottles but will not fit them with the cork protruding from the bottle once open
customer_reviews.author: Luly

customer_reviews.title: Stay Away
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these wine cooler a few days ago. When received, the door of the cooler is broken however, I some how managed to macgyver something together where it some what works. The BIGGEST issue I have is that I cannot fit any of my wine bottles in it. Even with the smallest bottles I have, I cannot fit more than 2 in a rack which has led to me having to remove all the shelves and just put the bottles in standing right. Not what I purchased or expected.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Farley

customer_reviews.title: Warranty Issue!
customer_reviews.text: Unit quit working at 4 months. Ivation will only replace if cooler is sent back and if they deem the unit is warranted. The cost for shipping is almost much as the cooler itself. This cannot be right.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Broken in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: I have had it less than a year and it already does not work. I keep adjusting the temperature and it acts like its going down with the fan whirring but it just stays at 70 degrees. Now it literally just fluctuates between 70-71 degrees and I can't get it to change. I even cleaned it out. Very disappointed as it ruined four bottles of beer I was aging, which the ideal temperature is 55 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Lindaman

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and cools well, but too tight for many bottles
customer_reviews.text: The unit arrived with a small dent on one side. Overall it looks nice, cools well and runs quietly. Our only complaint is that it said it stored 750ml bottles. In order to fit our 750 ml bottles in, you have to forcefully cram them in - we are talking smacking them repeatedly with your hand to force them in as there isn't enough clearance between shelves. These are standard wine bottles, like Chloe Chardonnay, Cline Pinot Noir, Kendall Jackson, etc.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great fridge
customer_reviews.text: It came a day earlier than expected and seems to be a great fridge. When I turned it on it went from 70 degrees (room temp) to 60 within an hour and I couldn't hear the motor at all. It's even quieter than my regular refrigerator and looks great. Fits in small spaces which is a bonus. The only suggestion to them would be to make the bottle space a little bigger. Some bottles like Turley are a little wide, so they can't be put side by side facing the same direction.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Hall

customer_reviews.title: Dose not fit what it says
customer_reviews.text: This can not fit 12 bottles of champagne. The shelves are to close together and to fit 2 bottles on one shelf you need to put them in facing opposite directions.
customer_reviews.author: Avid grower

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and mid-size wine fridge
customer_reviews.text: Before this fridge, I ordered a 12-bottle fridge where 4 of the bottles stood up instead of laying down. That fridge was immediately returned after trying to put my wine bottles in, but the slots only fit small diameter 750ml bottles. That is incredibly restrictive in the wine world, especially for white wine. I then ordered this 12 bottle fridge. So far it has been incredibly quiet and every bottle fits. For some of the larger bottles, like champagne, I have to put them in backwards, but the surrounding slots are still usable.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Water leaking issue - see picture
customer_reviews.text: Water leaking - IVFWCT121B I bought this Ivation 12-bottle on Feb/2019. The looking and usage is fine but some months ago I noticed some labels were getting wet and then I saw a pool of water on the bottom as it shown in the picture. It looks like the drainpipe is clogged however any information of maintenance is available in the fabric manual. I keep the cooler always up on 60F and the apartment AC on 77F - no likely condensation. I got in contact to the manufacturer and they told me since the product is out of 1y warranty they cannot do anything to help me. Please consider this post before you go ahead with your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Blank

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: Best feature is that it went to temperature fairly quickly, and seems to stay on temperature. Packaging worked, despite the outside box being virtually completely open! It's attractive. It's important to know you need to give it plenty of space so that hot air won't accumulate, but I've had no problem with that. I found another slightly less expensive, but it is no longer available. I've taken a chance on an unknown brand, but this has worked well before!
customer_reviews.author: BHoney

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Temp display is very bright with no dimmer, and a year in, parts of the display are no longer working so it doesn’t show the right temp. Overall it works fine though.
customer_reviews.author: Kate McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Wine Cellar!
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what it says it'll do! Bought it as a gift for a friend and she LOVES it! The wine stays nice and chilled. The blue light inside and smokey door is so sexy. This cannot comfortably fit big bottles. The regular sized skinny wine bottles fit two on each shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have been very happy with my 2 purchases of this chiller. They both have been maintaining the temperature very well and are very quiet. The only criticism I have is that the chiller could be slightly taller with a little more space between racks to accommodate larger wine bottles more easily. I have been able to fit them all in, but not without some effort for the wider bottles, causing some etching of the labels (so, just an aesthetic issue). However, the depth dimension seems to be perfect, as I have been able to fit bottles that I have opened and vacuum-plugged.
customer_reviews.author: NukeEng

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Appliance
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using my Invation Wine Cellar for a month now and I love it. It has a narrow profile that makes it fairly unobtrusive, is SUPER QUIET and could not have been easier to set up. I’ve filled it with12 bottles of wine and all were cooled to the exact temp that I set.
customer_reviews.author: T. HICKS

customer_reviews.title: Not Cold Enough
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my girlfriend, nice, small and quite BUT it does not keep white wines and champagne cold enough at all... and this one doesn’t turn down past 50 degrees. I know “experts” say keep at 50 but imo it doesn’t even chill the wine would need something low 40’s
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective out of the box. Bad customer service.
customer_reviews.text: From the get go, this unit was defective, flashing the blue LED, EE, error code. Despite unplugging it several times and up for 24 hours, and moving positions (all the remedies of Ivations’ customer service, the product would not allow you to override the error code. And even move up the arrows to select your temperature. Their solution was to contact Amazon. I will be shopping around with other manufacturers as I was very disappointed in the overall experience.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, function, and price!
customer_reviews.text: So far I am very pleased - I ordered a 12 bottle and 18 bottle model. They look great, are quiet and were affordable. I've checked the temps myself and they are accurate. edit: August 2020 and we're still going strong. love this wine fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: More attractive than functional.
customer_reviews.text: If you want a handsome, quiet wine fridge, this does the trick. If you, however, want a “nice” wine fridge, I wouldn’t select this one. The racks feels super cheap. The designers somehow didn’t understand that people might want to keep champagne in the fridge too (the slightly different bottle shape doesn’t fit in the racks... had to remove the top one and place the bubbles on the top rack). Overall, it’s a fine wine fridge, but the interior design could be better and of higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, not a huge wine drinker but I have a glass occasionally and was tired of my fridge being full. It fits the bottles nicely and I hear nothing. Fits perfectly in narrow spaces. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: WashingtonCaps

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to program and use
customer_reviews.text: This unit is everything it is advertised. Light weight. Very easy to program and use. Lighted interior a nice touch. Slide out drawers make bottles even more accessible. Would recommend it for anyone wanting to cool a few bottles of their favorite wines.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended - except for the temprature controls
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on setup, but like most people, we lost the ability to change the temperature literally the day after it was plugged in. Lucky for us, we set it to the coldest temperature and it's stayed there consistently and works in that regard, but this could very easily become a problem down the line.
customer_reviews.author: Erik S

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and sleek. But it was much smaller than anticipated. If only they made the larger model in a slimmer size
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: does not get cold, temperature gage broke first day
customer_reviews.text: We had this for one day and the temperature gauge broke so we cannot adjust the temp at all now. It never gets cold enough to put anything in it either. We were never able to use it. I need to return it. Very dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: M. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great wine fridge
customer_reviews.text: Arrived super quick. Plugged in and it started cooling immediately. Took a couple hours and it is working perfectly. Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quiet and sleek wine fridge
customer_reviews.text: Had two small issues that didn't impact the functionality of the fridge, but mentioned it anyway to the seller. They contacted me immediately to resolve the issue and I can say I'm very pleased with their customer service and the product itself. Fridge is loud at first use while it cools down, but then is extremely silent and maintains the perfect temperature. Fits 12 bottles well and simple to use. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Keeps the wine at the perfect temperature. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: danmo

customer_reviews.title: Update: Unit working as intended
customer_reviews.text: Update: Although there were some hiccups in replacing the original cooler, the unit I have now seems to be working fine and keeping temperature. There were some logistical issues to deal with but the vendor was quite responsive and I would give their customer service 5 stars. Original: I was looking forward to the chiller based on the reviews but upon receipt, the unit doesn't even turn on. I followed the instructions precisely (i.e. letting it stand up right for 2 hours before plugging it into a wall outlet).
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wine fridge
customer_reviews.text: Great wine fridge. Sleek design. Not sure why it asked to review warmth since it’s a fridge but gave it 5 stars. It does not get warm on top if that’s the question
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Bruns

customer_reviews.title: Never Buy !!!
customer_reviews.text: The seller is irrelevant. Product is defective and we can not use. The seller did not help.
customer_reviews.author: Berk Çoban

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as a wedding gift. The recipients really like it especially that it does not take up a lot of space. The only downside, only very standard sized bottles fit. For example for champagne bottles you have to remove a shelf, And take two spaces for one bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The lights on the front panel turned on for May b 30s and then went off again. I tried switch back on but without success, unplugged n replugged n tried turn on and nothing My assistant wrote to customer support n was not helpful so the machine is still sitting in my home not working Been too busy to write review until now Extremely disappointed with lack of customer support
customer_reviews.author: Ray Ng

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves this. It isn't too big, ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this . It isn't too big , can hold twelve bottle of wine and is quiet. You don't even know its there in our dining room
customer_reviews.author: C. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Great Size
customer_reviews.text: Its a cute little size, it is also very sleek looking. I enjoy sleekness of things, you can't even tell its in the house. I love the mirrored look too on the door, you can't even see the bottles inside unless you turn on the interior light. My mom loves it as I got it for her birthday.
customer_reviews.author: dana swenson

customer_reviews.title: Died after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Motor got louder and louder over past several months, then all of a sudden the temp went from my standard 55 degrees to 70 degrees. Tried to reset, but it doesn’t hold the temp. The wine that I lost cost more than the wine cooler.......
customer_reviews.author: Cindy B

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it’s quiet. It keeps the wine at a temperature below room temperature. It’s not cold cold but it’s cool.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fridge
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a nice fridge for the price. Very well built
customer_reviews.author: WHEELS1979

customer_reviews.title: Temperature
customer_reviews.text: The temperature doesn't get colder than 50 degrees. I like to have my wine chilled to about 40 or lower. better off using a fridge. usable but not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Almos

customer_reviews.title: Great fridge
customer_reviews.text: Does it's job. Doesn't get hot. Quiet and nice. Only thing to constructively say is it would be nice to be able turn off the temperature review.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t get as cool as it said it would. It was missing a foot and I didn’t realize till after I through all the packaging away. Somewhat disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Pascarelli

customer_reviews.title: Great fridge at a great price
customer_reviews.text: The wine fridge arrived promptly, in great shape, and was a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Sallie Woodell

customer_reviews.title: Great wine fridge
customer_reviews.text: Very happy so far, well made, solid, and very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Williams

customer_reviews.title: No longer stays cool
customer_reviews.text: I really really like this wine fridge but we’ve only had it 3 months and it’s no longer staying cool - it won’t go down past 60 degrees now. It’s super sleek and compact but that also means that a lot of bottle shapes don’t fit in it.
customer_reviews.author: Must love dogs

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Price was amazing. Gave it to my hubby on Father's Day
customer_reviews.author: Neferteria

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: We've been very happy with this cooler. We just put in the racks and plugged it in and it's working great.
customer_reviews.author: handy man

customer_reviews.title: Helps ensure that the temperature is constant
customer_reviews.text: I just recently added a wet bar to my home and this 12 bottle wine cooler ended up being a perfect addition to it. We love our wine at home and it's so nice that we finally have a proper place to store it. You can set the temperature to what you deem fit and then it will keep that temperature constant. It also helps ensure that it is constantly humid.
customer_reviews.author: Abs M

customer_reviews.title: Life expectancy
customer_reviews.text: This is my third wine cooler in four years. All are from different manufacturers. It is interesting they only give a one year warranty. Hopefully we have better luck with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Leininger

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful gift for the price and works perfectly. Packaging was also impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great for those who are wine lovers
customer_reviews.text: My family really likes wine, but a lot of it would go bad as we wouldn't store it properly, so we thought that it was time to invest in a wine cooler. We are so happy with this one as it does a great job of protecting the taste of our wine. However, it also looks great and doesn't make any noise, which I had initially been worried about.
customer_reviews.author: Tranoc Cara

customer_reviews.title: Quiet
customer_reviews.text: I really like the wine cooler. I had issues with the temperature so I reach out to the manufacturer - they were super helpful with the issue - great Customer Service
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Quiet!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped well, looks nice, nice size. Nice that you can choose to leave the light on inside or not while door is closed. Expect it to be a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: I love my Ivation 12 bottle wine cooler
customer_reviews.text: I love my Ivation 12 bottle wine cooler. It's sleek design fits well in the space in my home. It was easy to use; and received it promptly and in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Phillie Girl

customer_reviews.title: Its great. It keeps my wine a an excellent temperature ...
customer_reviews.text: Its great. It keeps my wine a an excellent temperature and is compact enough to store in many places!
customer_reviews.author: ziggs57

customer_reviews.title: Error codes immediately
customer_reviews.text: Item displayed the error code EE from the moment it was plugged in. It also had a dent in the top of the unit. Will not buy anything else from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Not keeping temperature for past couple months
customer_reviews.text: I set temperature to 53 degrees. Refrigerator unable to drop below 60 degrees. Refrigerator not even a year old when this started happening.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Nakamura

customer_reviews.title: Champagne bottles won’t fit
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good size for slender wine bottles but the racks aren’t adjustable so it doesn’t fit champagne bottles or large bottles of wine.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn B. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a gift for a friend, and it’s so nice I’m planning on buying myself one. He’s a wine enthusiast and he fell in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Like it ! Everything is good. Have problems with the delivery. USPS didnt delivery the date expected. Have to wait two more days.
customer_reviews.author: Nitzia Lamberty

customer_reviews.title: I love the design of this wine cooler
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with the design of this wine cooler. It is so sleek, so it fits in perfectly with the modern design of my bar. It is also very quiet, so you won't ever notice it as you sip on your beverage. In addition, this fridge does a good job of ensuring that the temperature and the humidity levels remain constant.
customer_reviews.author: Lock

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR SMALL SPACES!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS WINE REFRIGERATOR! Virtually noise-free, good looking and easy to set up!
customer_reviews.author: Maribrow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Works great. Keeps the wine cool. I have had no problems with it at all.
customer_reviews.author: LBrown

customer_reviews.title: Terrific starter wine fridge
customer_reviews.text: Very compact and keeps the wine at just the right temperature. My only small quibble is the blue display light -- wish I could switch that off. But that's minor. This is a quality product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: so quiet, only comment is the blue light showing ...
customer_reviews.text: so quiet, only comment is the blue light showing the temperature lights up the whole family room, could be a little dimmer.
customer_reviews.author: biker

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I brought it to keep my beers in. It holds 3 6 packs and keeps them nice and cold. The led is bright but doesn't matter because its kept in the game room. Overall nice and sleek.
customer_reviews.author: Sheteria Cooks

customer_reviews.title: One out of two ain't bad
customer_reviews.text: I bought one unit to replace another older brand that had started dripping internally. Out of the box, it was sleek, trim, and the smoked glass front gives it a subdued decor when in place. The instructions were clear and simple. The unit came to temperature quickly and, best and most important to me, was absolutely silent in ongoing operation. I loved it, so much so that I ordered a second unit. Unfortunately this second unit had an intermittent fan noise so much more noticeable as it sat beside its silent companion. As usual, Amazon's return policy came the rescue so my satisfaction level with the process remains high.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Very nice wine cellar!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had it very long but so far it's working great and lookin' good! You better get one too.
customer_reviews.author: K. Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Will not last. Quality issue.
customer_reviews.text: Product worked for barely 5 months. Now clicks repeatedly and doesn’t work anymore. Would not recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Great size and item. Looks beautiful and really does its job.
customer_reviews.author: A. Yensi

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, attractive black cabinet runs quietly and keeps wines at selected temperature.
customer_reviews.text: Attractive sleek black cabinet, runs quietly and keeps wine at selected temperature - as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Cincerely

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Although I don’t use it as a wine cooler, but as a nightstand and water bottle cooler in my bedroom. Operation noise is very low and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfgang Boettger-Hilbert

customer_reviews.title: unit was damaged annd was not use able
customer_reviews.text: This was a used unit and when I opened the box there was a large dent in the back corner and the door would not stay on its hinge so I returned this item with no problems and ordered the 18 bottle unit NEW and I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Whitford

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: In our new house we just don’t have a cool spot to store wine so this has been great. Works well, quiet.
customer_reviews.author: tp

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My son got this as a gift for me and I love it...
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna

customer_reviews.title: elegant and functional
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Haven't had this item for very long but so far I'm impressed. We bought it for our business and didn't have much space to put it. The size makes it very functional and it is a very nice looking unit! Love the inside light!
customer_reviews.author: Jil

customer_reviews.title: Great Wine Fridge!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this a week ago. So far, so good! It's quiet and fits very well in the corner of where I intended it to go. Some people had said they needed to hold the up and down button to open it. I haven't had to do that unless I want to change the temperature (I'm keeping it on 55 degrees). Very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Packer Fan

customer_reviews.title: wine time
customer_reviews.text: Perfect wine cooler for my small collection. Not too big and fits well in the kitchen under the table. Feeling like I know more about wine already.
customer_reviews.author: Marti Scott

customer_reviews.title: Like the look of Iook of it
customer_reviews.text: Received my wine refrigerator as promised. Like the look of Iook of it. Runs very quietly. My only comment would be that the temperature fluctuates a couple degrees below where I have it set. Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Deanne Paule

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: The chiller arrived with the corner of the unit being crushed!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift , she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Shawnna. Crisman

customer_reviews.title: Nice wine fridge
customer_reviews.text: Does what it’s supposed to, holds 12 bottles of wine, keeps them at 50 degrees and looks great next to our beer fridge!
customer_reviews.author: Adam G. Rieg

customer_reviews.title: The wine is chilled
customer_reviews.text: The product was delivered dented. Although it does not affect The operability it’s merely cosmetic. I can live with it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Very little light gets in
customer_reviews.text: I love how very little light gets into this wine cooler while it is also able to keep a good level of humidity.
customer_reviews.author: Wardup Birch

customer_reviews.title: Slim Space Saving Design
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter. It was the perfect size ( design is space saving), very easy to use & maintains her wine at the temperature she selected. She loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Judy P Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: Have had it plugged in for about 2 days, but quiet and works as advertised. Excellent speed of delivery, 2 days as Prime promised!
customer_reviews.author: jbill

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely enjoy this little wine refrigerator! It’s quiet, efficient, and looks great. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LEDs burned out in less than a year.
customer_reviews.text: This is junk. LEDs partially burned out in one year rendering this product useless.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done well
customer_reviews.text: I love wine and I have a lot of it, so in order to make sure that all of them taste good, even after some time, I got this cooler. It gets the job done well!
customer_reviews.author: Benedick

customer_reviews.title: We love it, very quiet and it’s a nice compact size to fit most anywhere.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps our wine at perfect temperature. We placed it right in our kitchen so see it often reminding us to enjoy our wine often!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie A. Nolden

customer_reviews.title: The price is so low
customer_reviews.text: The price of this wine cooler is so low when you think about how well it operates and how much wine it stores!
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Castile

customer_reviews.title: Great little wine cooler
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what they said it would be. Made for a perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you know the size.
customer_reviews.text: It was a lot smaller than I thought and a lot shorter as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Chillin' Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It fits perfectly in my room and keeps my wine chilled at the perfect temperature
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Really does a wonderful job
customer_reviews.text: This wine cooler is exactly what I had been looking for! It really does a wonderful job.
customer_reviews.author: Burns

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in my mini bar
customer_reviews.text: I really love the minimalist and sleek design of this wine cooler. It looks great in my mini bar.
customer_reviews.author: Acs

product_meta.title: Ivation 12 Bottle Thermoelectric Red And White Wine Cooler/Chiller Counter Top Wine Cellar with Digital Temperature Display, Freestanding Refrigerator Smoked Glass Door Quiet Operation Fridge,Black
product_meta.description:
The Ivation Wine Cooler keeps your wine at the correct & consistent temperature and stable environment, protecting the wine from exterior lights and elements, and is specially built to have zero vibration, so the wine could be aged and stored properly, enabling it to preserve and develop its delicious flavor, Color and Aroma, with the best possible mouthfeel, body, palette and finish, serving you the best and tastiest wine that is Full, Rich, Supple, Smooth, Round, and Balanced 

A Must Have for Wine Lovers and Collectors
The only way to properly protect your wine is to store them in the Ivation temperature-controlled beautifully designed wine cooler, even for short term storage. Serving temperature has a big effect on how a wine smells, tastes and feels in your mouth, even a very good wine can be awful at the wrong temperature, likewise improper temperature can also shorten the wine’s life or ruin the wine completely, Regular refrigerators are not an option, as they are too cold for most wines, and “Room temperature” is too warm. 

 Features & Specifications
Maintains the perfect temperature for red and white wines
Efficient thermoelectric cooling
Low noise, low vibration – will not disturb sediment
Touch controls and LCD display
Soft interior lighting with on/off control
Tempered smoked glass door
Solid, CFC-free polyurethane foam insulation Rated Power: 65W
Temperature Range: 50º – 64ºF (10º – 18ºC)
Unit Dimensions: 9.9" x 19.7" x 25" (25.2 x 50 x 63.5cm)
Weight: Net: 29.7 lbs. (13.5kg), Gross: 33 lbs. (15kg) 

 Impotent Tip: Do not put your wine cooler in the garage. The big temperature ranges of a garage will make the cooler run too often, shortening it’s life. 

 Buy with confident:If you need any help regarding any of our products don’t hesitate, we have a dedicated team ready to assist you please contact us at info@myivation.com or call 866-849-3049
feature_bullets: WINE COOLER (wine Cellar / Wine Chiller) A MUST HAVE: The only way to protect the quality and taste of your wines long or short term, and ensure it AGES at a consistent level, the wine has to be stored in the correct environment and CONSISTENT TEMPERATURE, (ideally in the range of 55° F) This free standing innovative wine cooler will protect your red or white wine, preserving its quality and rich flavors, so you could enjoy its real taste to the fullest.

PERFECT Stable TEMPERATURE: The Ivation cooler enables you to store your wines short & long term in a consistent stable temp environment, and allows you to customize the temp to one that creates an ideal climate for your wines ageing process (Range 50º – 64ºF (10º – 18ºC), therefore bringing out the true characteristics and full flavor of your wines in the long-term.

HUMIDITY, MINIMAL LIGHT: Insulated with Solid polyurethane heavy foam (CFC-free) & Closed with Thermopane doors that are tempered smoked, to ensure an interior odor-free environment that maintains constant humidity, keeping the cork from drying out, thus preventing more air to come into contact with the wine, also to ensure darkness, blocking out sunlight and harmful UV rays that breaks down the complex molecules that create the special flavors in properly aged wines.

NO VIBRATION & SUPER QUIET: Specially built with an Energy-efficient thermoelectric cooling system with no compressor, to minimize the vibration effect and noise, allowing your wine to age and settle properly, with no disturbance to its natural occurring sediments.

FEATURES: Sleek design with exterior digital Touch controls and LCD temp (°F/°C) Soft interior lighting with on/off control 100% Customer Satisfaction GUARANTEED we stand behind our products and pride ourselves with exceptional customer service care. If you need help please contact us at info@myivation.com or call 866-849-3049.
